description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0555 ( Invoice Type)
name: v2 Invoice Type

text.div:
Invoice Type

CodeDescriptionCommentVersion
bk Blockadded v2.6
fn FinalFinal Invoiceadded v2.6
fs Fee for Serviceadded v2.6
